name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ ひかり
summary:
平和を守る正義の魔法戦士「ひかり」は、
今日も悪者を退治する。 
でも、今日の敵はなかなか手強い！
--
Peace defending,the justice magical Warrior "Hikari" is fighting with evil. But this time, the evil is so powerful,can she coquer by herself to win at the end?

With one tap she trembles and she moans softly.
You can also use your finger to make her do as you wish!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
info:
